overview: A scientist obsessed with bugs becomes an accidental superhero in this magical action comedy. In the world of a tennis-racket wielding secretary, as well as a crew made up of an evil exterminator, electrician and garbageman, Dr. Roach might not save the day, but as long as he thinks he does, everything is fine.
tagline: A superhero is still a superhero.
title: Super Undead Doctor Roach
